articles.content:
Greetings to Slovenian Prime Minister 
    Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, Premier of the DPRK cabinet, set a message of greetings to Anton Rop, Prime Minister of Slovenia, on the occasion of its Independence Day.
 Sincerely wishing the prime minister great success in his responsible work for the economic development of the country, the message expressed belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms.    
 Meanwhile, Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a similar message to his Slovenian counterpart Dimitrij Rupel.

articles.title: Greetings to Slovenian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Prime Minister of Croatia 
    Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, Premier of the DPRK cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Ivica Racan, Prime Minister of Croatia, on the occasion of its National Day.
 The message wished him a new success in his responsible work for the stability and development of the country and expressed belief that the relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in the future, too.    
 Meanwhile, Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to his Croatian counterpart Tonino Picula.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Croatia
articles.content:
Greetings to Slovenian President
    Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Janez Drnovsek, President of the Republic of Slovenia, on June 25 on the occasion of the day of Its Independence.
 Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to develop favourably in the future, too, the message wholeheartedly wished the Slovenian people prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Djibouti
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Croatia
    Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on June 25 sent a message of greetings to Stipe Mesic, President of Croatia, on the occasion of its National Day.
 Kim Yong Nam  sincerely wished the president a new success in his work and the people of Croatia prosperity.

articles.title: Russian delegation leaves
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Djibouti
    Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, today sent a message of greetings to Ismail Omar Guelleh, President of Djibouti, on the occasion of the 26th anniversary of Its Independence.
 The president in the message expressed the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would as ever grow stronger and develop and wished him and the people of Djibouti greater success in their work for the building of a new society.

articles.title: Head of delegation of Russian Orthodox Church interviewed
articles.content:
Russian delegation leaves
    Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Russian Orthodox Church headed by Archbishop Kliment, first vice-chairman for foreign affairs, left here today after participating in the ground-breaking ceremony of an orthodox monastery in pyongyang.
 It was seen off at the airport by chairman of the committee of the Korean Orthodox Church Ho Il Jin and Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Andrei Karlov.    
 During its stay in Korea the delegation visited Mangyongdae, the Tower of the Juche Idea, the International Friendship Exhibition, the Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification, the Liberation Tower and other places.
